text: The pizza was good and it was done in a timely manner. Really, there was nothing wrong with experience. The employee that helped us at the counter was friendly. text: I always loved pizza hut. For the past few months the quality at this store has gone down a lot. My last order was for pan pizza, I paid extra for it and I got a hand tossed. I asked for extra sauce. Not enough sauce. The pizza was dry and tasteless. Last straw. Will not go back there again.
